verse:
यथोर्णनाभिः सृजते गृह्णते च यथा पृथिव्यामोषधयः संभवन्ति।
यथा सतः पुरुषात्‌ केशलोमानि तथाऽक्षरात्‌ संभवतीह विश्वम्‌ ॥

terms.उर्णनाभिः: a spider from its own navel
terms.सतः: from the existing or original cause

meaning: Meaning:Just as a spider creates and withdraws its web from its own navel, just as plants originate from the earth, and just as hairs on the human body grow from the existing cause, in the same way, the entire universe is produced from the imperishable or eternal principle.
